pageContext.Name: Ombre Thread & Mirror Work Lehenga 16-18 (bust 46")

Lilac blouse and ombre skirt with can-can

Attachable sleeves

Soft net dupatta

Mirror and threadwork design front and back

Ombre colour - light to dark lilac

Bust size 46"

UK 16-18

For any questions about measurements or how to measure your bust please see our size chart
